name: AntonWare
description:
Anton's behind on his quota and Annie's nowhere to be seen. What misadventures and hijinks could these characters be getting themselves into? Walk a day in the shoes of Anton, Annie, and Brulo in just another regular day in Boiler City!

  • Play 46 different minigames!
  • Made with a strict 500x500 canvas in mind!
  • Contains a soundtrack made entirely in WarioWare DIY!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

J Key - Primary Button

K Key - Secondary Button

Esc Key - Start

[Made for Summitsphere's "ANTONJAM 3 & BLAST"]

Assets and programming by Ryan Fragoso (Empty Vessel)

Music and SFX by Zach Fragoso (BeezerGuttler)
